sub_title: Global Supply Chain | Analytics|  Finance | Ex-PwC , Ex-EY
summary:
Seasoned Analytics Professional with 9 Years of Experience with Finance + Supply Chain Combination.  

Part of multiple implementation Projects with PwC and GEP.  Key Expertise Area Forecasting , Order Management, Inventory Management, ASN and GRN.

Current Professional Brief:
I am currently working with GEP in their Prague Office as part of Customer Implementation Team in Supply Chain Domain

In my last role with PwC I was  part of Enterprise Performance Management Team. We specialize in understanding the financial planning and Consolidation requirements and map the same to the SAP system.


Tools 
GEP NEXXE : Supply Chain Module
GEP SMART: Reports Module
SAP BPC 10, SAPBPC 10.1 NW, SAP BPC 10.1 on HANA , SAP BW (SAP BPC Interface) .
 Other Docs: Word, Excel (VBA Basic) , PowerPoint


Education:
I have completed MBA in Finance from NMIMS in 2013 and also completed 1 year certification programme from Praxis Business School in 2015-16.

Recent Additional Certification:
I have also completed CELTA Certification (Corporate Trainer course for Certificate in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages) and attended workshop for teaching  Business English from Oxford TEFL Prague . This certification is Level 5 given by Cambridge.

Blog Details
http://sayang8.blogspot.com/
